mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.node_name , t1.app_flag , t1.create_time , t1.concent , t1.FILE_NAME , t1.LEVEL_SETUP_ID , t1.log_level from sys_app_error_info t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update sys_app_error_info t1 set t1.node_name =#{dto.nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.app_flag =#{dto.appFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.create_time =#{dto.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.concent =#{dto.concent,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete t1 from sys_app_error_info t1 where t1.ID in (${ids} )
delete t1 from sys_app_error_info t1 where t1.id in( ${ids})
mapper.update: update sys_app_error_info t2 set t2.MATCHED_FLAG='Y' where t2.MATCHED_FLAG='N'
mapper.select:
select e.app_flag, s.id, s.key_word, s.log_level, s.email_flag, s.SMS_FLAG, s.SHOW_DETAIL_FLAG, count(e.id) count, group_concat(e.ID) errorIds from sys_app_error_info e, sys_app_level_setup s
where e.level_setup_id = s.id
and mod(#{time}, s.rate) = 0
and s.rate_unit = 1 and e.create_time >date_format(date_sub(now(),interval #{maxRate} minute), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and s.rate_unit = 1 and e.create_time >date_format(date_sub(now(), interval 1 minute), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and s.rate_unit = 2 and e.create_time >date_format(date_sub(now(), interval 1 hour) , '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
group by e.app_flag, s.id, s.key_word, s.log_level, s.email_flag, s.SMS_FLAG, s.SHOW_DETAIL_FLAG
